27#include "includes.h"
28__RCSID("$NetBSD: fatal.c,v 1.6 2017/04/18 18:41:46 christos Exp $");
29#include <sys/types.h>
30
31#include <stdarg.h>
32
33#include "log.h"
34
35/* Fatal messages. This function never returns. */
36
37void
38fatal(const char *fmt,...)
39{
40 va_list args;
41
42 va_start(args, fmt);
43 do_log(SYSLOG_LEVEL_FATAL, fmt, args);
44 va_end(args);
45 cleanup_exit(255);
46}
47
